embed.description:
EssentialsX officially supports the **CraftBukkit**, **Spigot**, and [**Paper (recommended)**](https://papermc.io/) server software running the following Minecraft versions:
‚Ä¢ ‚úÖ **1.16.5** - EssentialsX actively develops against and supports these versions.
‚Ä¢ ‚ö†Ô∏è **1.8.8**, **1.9.4**, **1.10.2**, **1.11.2**, **1.12.2**, **1.13.2**, **1.14.4**, and **1.15.2** - these versions are still supported, but are not a priority for us, and may be dropped in a future release.

EssentialsX **does not support** the following Minecraft versions and server software:

footer.text: We will not be able to provide support if you use any of the unsupported software or versions listed above.

fields.name: üõë Mohist
fields.value: ‚Ä¢ Do not use Mohist. Mohist tricks users into deleting official EssentialsX jars and installing unofficial modified software. [Click here for more information.](https://essentialsx.net/do-not-use-mohist.html)

fields.name: üõë Akarin, Yatopia and some other "high performance" Paper forks
fields.value: ‚Ä¢ These servers include **dangerous non-standard behavior**, which can not only impact EssentialsX's functionality but also cause damage to your worlds. If you *need* a high-performance fork, you should consider using [Tuinity](https://github.com/Tuinity/Tuinity/).

fields.name: üõë Magma
fields.value: ‚Ä¢ Magma modifies EssentialsX bytecode at runtime and includes hacks to fix other bugs in Magma. If you encounter an issue with EssentialsX on Magma, please contact them for support.

fields.name: üõë Other Forge/Fabric hybrid server software, including Cauldron, Thermos, CatServer, etc
fields.value:
‚Ä¢ The Bukkit API does not properly support mods, and using Bukkit plugins on modded Forge/Fabric servers will cause significant problems.
For Forge servers, use [**SpongeForge**](https://www.spongepowered.org/downloads/spongeforge) with [**Nucleus**](https://nucleuspowered.org) for plugin support and a complete Essentials replacement, or consider a mod designed for Forge such as [**FTB Essentials**](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/ftb-essentials).
